text: In the sewers of Yomihara―
This was the escape route that Shizuru had prepared.
Using these sewers, we would be able to proceed to the entrance of Yomihara without having to pass through the dangerous streets of the city.

name: Yamata no Orochi
text: Oohh... It got a lot quieter back there. Looks like we gave those fat-asses the slip.
Yamata no Orochi, who had been walking in front, turned around and cracked a smile.

name: Me
text: Looks like it...
I also checked behind us, making sure that we were safe.
These sewers had many branches and were almost like a maze.
With this much of a lead, it was likely the Trolls wouldn't be able to catch us.

name: Me
text: Yamata no Orochi, let's take a short break. I'm worried about everyone's fatigue.

name: Yamata no Orochi
text: A break? ...Alright, got it. I don't need breaks, but whatever the boss says goes.
The female warrior shrugged her shoulders and sat down by the wall holding her enormous sword.
In actuality, Hebiko, Shikanosuke, and I were not even that tired.
But I still took a break for Sago-san's sake.

name: Hebiko
text: Is your body holding up, Sago-san?

name: Sago
text: Y-Yes... I'm sorry for the trouble, Hebiko-kun.
Due to his cyborg body malfunctioning, Sago-san wasn't able to move properly at the moment.
And even with Hebiko supporting him, this forced march must have been quite hard on him.

name: Sago
text: Good gracious, how utterly pathetic I am... Needing a young lady like you to support me...

name: Hebiko
text: C'mon now, don't talk like that! Heberyone's mission is to rescue you, Sago-san!

name: Hebiko
text: Don't hesitate to rely a bit more on Hebiko♪

name: Sago
text: Hehe... You're young, but you're a good Taimanin. Thank you. I'll take you up on your offer.
Sago's strained voice softened a little.
Hebiko's cheerfulness and bravery seemed to have warmed his heart.

name: Me
text: (But from the looks of it... Hebiko and Sago-san can't be counted on in battle.)
Hebiko was supporting Sago-san and would not be able to participate in combat. And the same could be said about the person with the malfunctioning cyborg body himself.

name: Me
text: (Which means that our group's firepower is three people...)
We had shaken off the Trolls chasing us, but there was something else to worry about in these sewers.
According to Shizuru, these sewers were also affected by the Gate to the Devildom.
In other words, they had become home to dangerous demonic creatures...

name: Me
text: (Well then, how will three of us be able to cut our way through this...?)
I was racking my brain trying to find a strategy in case we should need it.

name: Shikanosuke
text: They're gone!? What's going on!?

name: Me
text: Hm?
From right beside me, I heard a voice that was free of any nervousness.

name: Shikanosuke
text: H-Hey, look at this, Fuma!! My snacks have disappeared!!!

name: Me
text: Your snacks...? You were going to eat snacks right now?

name: Shikanosuke
text: Now's the perfect time!! I'm just trying to relieve some of my fatigue during our break.

name: Me
text: Hm? Fair enough...
Being able to regain strength during a break was a crucial point that could determine the success or failure of a mission.
So we each had brought our own portable rations of preserved food and snacks.

name: Shikanosuke
text: But forget about that! My snacks are more important here! The soy sauce cookies I bought at Inageya!!

name: Shikanosuke
text: I didn't eat them and saved them until now, but they're not in my bag!!!

name: Me
text: Pfft, by snacks you meant soy sauce cookies? Aren't those a bit strong-tasting?

name: Shikanosuke
text: They're super good though!?

name: Shikanosuke
text: ...I mean, they can't hold a candle to Saika-san's cookies that I tried before, but...

name: Me
text: Well, that's because Saika's homemade cookies are the best.
Come to think of it, Saika's cookies I had brought with me had also disappeared from my bag...

name: Shikanosuke
text: But still! They're not here! You ate them, didn't you? Last night, sneakily, when you got hungry!

name: Me
text: Huh!? No way I'd eat them!! I mean, my snacks were also eaten! That was you, wasn't it!?

name: Shikanosuke
text: Your snacks!? I didn't eat them!!

name: Me
text: I didn't eat them either!!

name: Yamata no Orochi
text: Hm-hm... You're so full of energy, boys. If you've got that kind of energy, you don't need a break, do you?
Just as we were getting invested in our trivial argument, Yamata no Orochi called out to us.

name: Me
text: Ah, no... it's nothing. Please don't mind us...

name: Me
text: (See!? Because you're so noisy, she looked at us as if we're stupid!)

name: Shikanosuke
text: (Ehhh!?? It's my fault!!?)
Lowering our voices, we kept at it.
However, at that moment.

name: Me
text: (No, wait a second...?)
I recalled one more thing.

name: Me
text: (On our way to Yomihara, Sana-san's can had also been empty...)
I had been slightly concerned about it at the time, but had forgotten about it because of the difficulties we had faced on the journey.

name: Shikanosuke
text: What the hell, Fuma!? So you're the one who ate them after all!? You just remembered something, didn't you!?

name: Me
text: No, I just remembered that―Hmmm?

name: Me
text: Wait, Shikanosuke, did you hear something just now...?

name: Shikanosuke
text: Eeeeh!? What do you mean by "something!?" Even if you start telling ghost stories in a place like this, I won't fall for it―

name: Me
text: ...That's not it. You can't hear anything? There's the sound of something far away coming closer...
*Skrrr... Skrrrrr...*
The sound of something like a massive body slithering got closer to us little by little.

name: Shikanosuke
text: I-I-I can hear iiiiit!!!! What is it!? One of your pranks!? That's what it is, isn't iiiiit!!?

name: Me
text: Dummy, who's gonna play such a boring prank!! Shizuru said before, didn't she!? The reason why nobody ever enters the sewers is―

name: Devil Worm
text: HRRRRRSSSSSS!!!!!

name: Me
text: ...Because they're a nest for demonic creatures. That's why they'd be convenient as an escape route...

name: Shikanosuke
text: Y-Yes... She did say that...
Hideous monsters appeared from the darkness deep within the sewers.

name: Yamata no Orochi
text: Oh, looks like our break is over. Show us a good time, you monsters!!
